titles.title: A bill to increase Federal payments to units of general local government for entitlement lands, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S822)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Department of Agriculture, Department of the Interior, and Office of Management and Budget.

committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources
committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

bill.summary: 1/27/1993--Introduced. Amends Federal law to: (1) increase Federal payments to local governments for entitlement lands; (2) require the Secretary of the Interior to adjust such payments for inflation; and (3) exempt from such payments any lands conveyed to the United States in exchange for Federal lands.
